sentences.en: Any presumption that smoking is in anyway beneficial is totally preposterous.
sentences.cn: 任何对抽烟不管怎样是有益的假设都是完全荒谬的.

sentences.en: He rushed about doing preposterous things in an extraordinary manner.
sentences.cn: 他奔来奔去,离奇古怪地干下了种种荒谬的事情.

sentences.en: He was usually preposterous vet somehow achieved a certain dignity by his remoteness and agelessness.
sentences.cn: 他自己虽常常很荒谬,然而他以他表现出来的冷漠和无情赢得了一定的尊重.

sentences.en: I knew then that the idea I'd had and dismissed as preposterous was true.
sentences.cn: 这时我知道了,我曾经想过但认为是荒谬绝伦的事竟然是真的.

sentences.en: It is preposterous to attribute to mere external conditions.
sentences.cn: 仅仅以外部环境解释一切是不合理的.

sentences.en: It was the most preposterous position in which I never found myself in my life.
sentences.cn: 这是我有生以来从未碰到的最荒谬绝伦的场面.

sentences.en: It would be preposterous to shovel coal with a teaspoon.
The idea was preposterous and I determined not to give it a second thought.
sentences.cn: 这个想法太荒谬了,我决心不再想它了.

sentences.en: The implication that marital infidelity enhances a leader's credibility is preposterous.
sentences.cn: 婚姻不忠会提升领导人可信度的暗示荒谬之极。

sentences.en: The way the workers are getting out of hand just lately is simply preposterous!
sentences.cn: 工人的嚣张,简直不成话!

sentences.en: The whole idea sounds absolutely preposterous!
sentences.cn: 整个想法听起来荒谬透顶！
这些要求简直荒谬绝伦！

sentences.en: They are either preposterous, or perfect.
sentences.cn: 它们不是不自然就是有点过分.

sentences.en: This preposterous order roused the Carthaginians from despair.
sentences.cn: 这一荒谬的命令使迦太基人从绝望中惊醒.

trans.tran_cn: 反常的，荒谬可笑的，不合理的，悠谬
